name: Wunter
description:
Developer:  ZohelMoon - itch.io, https://imrmnabil.itch.io/

Purpose: a jam about time. - itch.io
Ability: SlowMotion, Scan, Dash, Recall, Reverse Specific Time

Story: Your Tribe came to this forest in search of food. But no one knew soldiers were roaming in the forest in search of the deadly spiders.   Now there is an encounter between wolves and soldiers. The Warrior Wolf Leader is also missing.   Everything depends on you to save your tribe from being finished once and for all.

Credit:

UI Icon: We have collected ICONs from Google Image Search

Promo background Music: Action Movie Music - Epic Suspenseful Fight Scene - FesliyanStudios - YouTube

Assets: Unreal Marketplace
